snippet: The two new comedy shows, “The Spoils of Babylon,” a comedy serial produced by Will Ferrell and Adam McKay, and “The Birthday Boys,” a variety show produced by Ben Stiller and Bob Odenkirk, would make their debuts on IFC this year.
abstract: The two new comedy shows, “The Spoils of Babylon,” a comedy serial produced by Will Ferrell and Adam McKay, and “The Birthday Boys,” a variety show produced by Ben Stiller and Bob Odenkirk, would make their debuts on IFC this year.

headline.main: IFC Orders New Comedy Shows from Will Ferrell, Ben Stiller and Bob Odenkirk
headline.print_headline: IFC Orders New Comedies From Ferrell and Stiller
